titleStmt.title: The castell of loue, translated out of Spanishe into Englyshe, by Johan Bowrchier knyght, lorde Bernis, at the instance of lady Elizabeth Carew, late wyfe to Syr Nicholas Carew knyght. The which boke treateth of the loue betwene Leriano and Laureola doughter to the kynge of Masedonia
Cárcel de amor. English
titleStmt.author: San Pedro, Diego de, fl. 1500.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A69179 of text S108528 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 634). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 198 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 109 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

titleStmt.title: The castell of loue, translated out of Spanishe into Englyshe, by Johan Bowrchier knyght, lorde Bernis, at the instance of lady Elizabeth Carew, late wyfe to Syr Nicholas Carew knyght. titleStmt.author: San Pedro, Diego de, fl. 1500.
Berners, John Bourchier, Lord, 1466 or 7-1533.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Pauls churchyarde by [R. Field for] Iohan Turke, at the sygne of the byble,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: San Pedro, Diego de. Carcel de amor.
Ostensible printer's name and address from colophon; actual printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
